Author: lIdlV
Text: It might be that your relationship has run its course. Time to break up (it’s hard) then get back up (it sucks) and grow (you’ll be stronger for it). I don’t know the whole story but I’m not sure your ED is ruining your relationship or it’s just highlighting the issues in your relationship. FWIW, my advice to any 17 year old in a long term relationship is: break up.

Author: jobbluetooth
Text: tbh I think you need to tell her, you have to communicate with your girlfriend and let her know that you’re relapsing so she can help you. I’ve had to if that conversation with my girlfriend and it’s really hard, but worth it in the end.
